item.title: Litter scattered down Petts Wood Road, 27th February
item.description:
Litter scattered down the pavement along Petts Wood Road. This includes broken bottles which is dangerous when walking dogs. There are no bins and the litter is getting worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 108, Petts Wood Road, Poverest, Orpington, Greater London

item.description:

item.title: Pickford Road road sign, 27th February
item.description:
The road sign for Pickford Road has broken so no sign indicating the name of road. The sign has been damaged sitting on the small grass verge where the tree is positioned Pickford road Avenue Road. Needs fixing!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Lane, Welling, Bexleyheath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly-tipping by neighbour into another neighbour's back garden and alleyway, 27th February
item.description:
11 Twigg close had workers to clean and renew their garden about a month ago. Old patio boads and waste was removed onto another neighbour's back garden and on alleyway behind my garden emergency garden door. It also contains leftover cut outs of their new artificial grass.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Twigg Close, North End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous potholes, 27th February
item.description:
Travelling down Petts Wood Road cars are swerving to avoid the numerous potholes. This is dangerous. Many cyclists and motorbikes travel down this main road and these potholes could prove lethal to these travellers for obvious reasons. The holes are getting bigger and work should be undertaken immediately before there is a serious accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 80, Petts Wood Road, Poverest, Orpington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

188 Widmore Road

item.title: Multiple sink hole pot hole, 27th February
item.description:
Multiple sink hole pot holes along the entire stretch of the road by the bus stop. Very deep and always pooled with water. The buses are now not coming near the bus stop and my elderly parents are struggling to get onto the bus due to this. I have been covered in dirty water by people driving through these massive holes. Very unsafe for all around, especially with the multitude of primary schools in this area.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southwood Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Please remove rubbish from trolley.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Eynsham Drive, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beechfield Cottages, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light out since October 2025, 27th February
item.description:
Street Light not working despite it being reported as Fixed several times. Unfortunately lying undermines confidence in the whole process. What's the point of reporting a problem if nothing is being done about the issue, and the official response is not true. I have staff who leave in the dark on an unlit pavement, that's why this important to us.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Wandsworth Road, Vauxhall, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping: 6+ Black Bin Bags, 27th February
item.description:
I saw 3 people fly tipping bin bags into the bushes on the alley corner at the marked spot. I wasn't able to tell what they were dumping or if there was any more. This happened at about 18:15 27/02/26.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thanet Road, North End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Old door and mattresses dumped on street, 27th February
item.description:
Old mattresses and an old door have been dumped on Cyrena Road (between Silvester Road and Whateley Road), blocking part of the car parking area. Items have been there for at least a week.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cyrena Road, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked garbage chute, 27th February
item.description:
We discovered that the garbage chute is blocked due to garbage being caught by the door (its parts inside the chute) This is the chute near flat 22 Ellington House, floor 2. The door doesn’t close because of this. We attempted to remove the blockage but were unsuccessful.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harper Road, The Borough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping AGAIN on Truman’s Road, 27th February
item.description:
Somebody has moved yet another mattress which was placed in the car park off Truman’s Road onto the public pavement. Nothing is being done to reprimand culprits and it’s happening far too regularly. There’s also a chair on the opposite side of the road.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salcombe Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
